attributes.action: Ensure out contribution to the rebuilding of Gaza is limited to a pro-rate amount when compared with other countries which are richer than the UK.
attributes.additional_details: There is a proclivity amongst our politicians to use our taxpayer pounds to make themselves good on the international stage by offering more and more of our taxpayers pounds to a HUGELY disproportionate amount when compared with the amounts offers by other, bigger, richer countries when it comes to rebuilding war zones.  WE THE TAXPAYER WOULD MUCH PREFER YOU SPENT THE MONEY IN THIS COUNTRY MAKING LIFE EASIER FOR US - IT IS, AFTER ALL, OUR MONEY YOU ARE HANDING OVER!!!!!!!!!!!!
